package.name: Canadian Functions
package.author: Dan Hoover
package.description: A group of functions that allow you to deal with Canadian stuff. Not like moose and Tim Horton's. More like provinces.

function.name: $prov = provFromAbbrevCA($string);
function.description: Returns the full province name when provided with an abbreviation. Returns false if invalid. Passing "french" as the second parameter returns the results in French. Deals with capitalization automagically.

function.name: providencesCA()
function.description: Returns an array of US State abbreviations in ABC order. Great for generating forms. Passing "french" in the function returns the names in French.
function.usage: $provs = providencesCA(); //returns an array of provinces in English.
